name: Killer Sniper Shooting 3d
description:
Killer Sniper Shooting 3D is the most amazing and realistic 3D Third Person Shooting game. In this gorgeous game you are a well trained elite member of army commandos and swat teams. Your battle is against cruel terrorist who attack on your country. Aim, shoot and destroy all enemy tanks and air attack. Experience exciting challenging missions that will test your skills on the battlefields of this epic war. There are various thrilling missions in this awesome tank war game. The game has High-quality, interactive 3D graphics, realistic environment and real sound effects.
Download and enjoy it!
